casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Patricia Dawn ABSHIRE. No. 459A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2008. James N. Freeman, Jr., Elkin, for Abshire. James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 666 S.E.2d 657 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of October 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2008."
